data.title: China: population of Beijing municipality 2023
data.meta_description: In 2023, around 21.86 million permanent residents were living in the administrative area of Beijing municipality.
data.text:
Supplementary notes

* Noticeable deviations in former years are mainly due to incomplete statistical figures and recalculations based on census data.

The figures take into account all residents living in the administrative area of Beijing municipality, including rural population and people living in distant suburbs. According to estimates, the population living in the urban area of Beijing, which is defined as all city districts with contiguous built-up areas, reached approximately 20.9 million in 2021.

Figures for earlier years have been taken from previous publications.

Values have been rounded.
